name: 2-bootstrap
description: This is a website for the fictional campsites review site NuCamp.

scripts.bashonly: node-sass -w css/styles.scss -o css/ & npm run lite
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run scss:sourcemap && npm run imagemin && npm run copyfonts && npm run usemin
scripts.commentOne: echo 'npm run bashonly is a substitute for parallelshell and onchange, does same thing with bash & character' && exit 1
scripts.commentTwo: echo 'imagemin would not install on my laptop, so I ran sharp - it cut my img dir size by 60%' && exit 1
scripts.scss:sourcemap: node-sass --source-map css/styles.css.map --output-style expanded -o css css/styles.scss > css/styles.css
scripts.test: echo 'Error: I dunno, download jest or something...?' && exit 1
scripts.usemin: usemin aboutus.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/aboutus.html && usemin contactus.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/contactus.html && usemin index.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/index.html

author: Avery Freeman
